thread.title: Windows Mobile job listings confirm Microsoft's continued support of the platform
thread.title_full: Windows Mobile job listings confirm Microsoft's continued support of the platform

author: Jez Corden
title: Windows Mobile job listings confirm Microsoft's continued support of the platform
text:
Windows 10 Mobile might be on the ropes, but Microsoft clearly isn't finished with the platform.
Microsoft observer h0x0d recently noticed two job listings for Windows Mobile careers, and they both highlight Microsoft's continued interest in the mobile space.
More notable than the job listings is the language Microsoft used to describe Windows Mobile's position and value to the company, providing further evidence of its long-term strategy.
